name: Dark Desire Mute 4
description:
Dark Desire Mute 4


This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life's of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

"“Holy ... love, you did all this for me?” Michelle asks. " - episode 1

"Addison takes Cindy’s hand an leads her into the apartment when there are two yoga mats laid out, some incense burning sweetly, and only the light from the open window drifting in." - episode 2

"“I need someone loyal, someone willing to do anything for me, no questions asked. That’s how it works in this business,” Stephanie sighs. " - episode 3

The visual novel has 4 episodes with 2 paths per episode and sometimes different outfits:
Episode 01 --- Michelle Comes Home
Episode 01x1 --- Ashley and Arisa

Episode 02 --- Addison's Passion
Episode 02x1 --- Cindy and Michelle - Sweet and Cute 1

Episode 03 --- Stephanie’s Second in Command
Episode 03x1 --- Cindy and Michelle - Sweet and Cute 2

Episode 04 --- Jeff's House (with Cindy)
- contains 3 view options with different outfits, poses and locations
